title: step_feedback variables not in packet (1.1 version)

content.raw:
In AtlasSimInterface_1.1.0, it appears that the step_feedback section is not getting loaded.

When
~~~
current_behavior: 5, desired_behavior: 5:

step_feedback: 
  status_flags: 1
  t_step_rem: 0.0
  current_step_index: 0
  next_step_index_needed: 0
  desired_step_saturated: 
    step_index: 0
    foot_index: 0
    duration: 0.0
    pose: 
      position: 
        x: 0.0
        y: 0.0
        z: 0.0
      orientation: 
        x: 0.0
        y: 0.0
        z: 0.0
        w: 0.0
    swing_height: 0.0
~~~

~~~
rostopic echo /atlas/atlas_sim_interface_state
~~~
says
~~~

    y: 8.02688407898
    z: 0.903372228146
  velocity: 
    x: -0.0249147396535
    y: 0.019729135558

foot_pos_est: 
  - 
    position: 
      x: 17.5679645538

    orientation: 
      x: -0.00404940871522

      w: 0.999939203262
  -

content.html:
In AtlasSimInterface_1.1.0, it appears that the step_feedback section is not getting loaded.

When

current_behavior: 5, desired_behavior: 5:

step_feedback: 
  status_flags: 1
  t_step_rem: 0.0
  current_step_index: 0
  next_step_index_needed: 0
  desired_step_saturated: 
    step_index: 0
    foot_index: 0
    duration: 0.0
    pose: 
      position: 
        x: 0.0
        y: 0.0
        z: 0.0
      orientation: 
        x: 0.0
        y: 0.0
        z: 0.0
        w: 0.0
    swing_height: 0.0

rostopic echo /atlas/atlas_sim_interface_state
